You look great.  Not today Mom.  I'm sure they're perfect and amazing.  What?  Yeah, that's mine. Thank you.  (under her breath, to the woman next to her) Ew. Kinda smells funny in here. Doesn't it? Smells bad. This house has a weird smell.  Wow, looks like someone's a pervert. It's none of my business. She's gross.  The ocean's are really polluted right now. Its not something to joke about.  Well, you registered for 'em so thank yourself, you picked them out. I did't do anything...  (sotto] It's disgusting. Here Mom's here.  Wow, cash. Kinda tacky. Lillian opens the envelope.  Are you fucking kidding me?    Nothing have fun at Sea World.  Shut up you ridiculous person, you a sneaky little cream and white cashmere--.  I think you do. Horses? Sculptures? Posters? Look at this stupid house! This stupid marshmallow puffy furniture!  And look at that cookie! Would you please everyone! Speaking of that cookie. I never got a piece! Annie marches into the back yard.  (shouting, we see her through the large  Mmmmm. Nothing says friendship like a thousand gallons of hot unsanitary chocolate! Hello swan, are you having fun? Did you enjoy the hip-hop dancers? 111. Everyone is watching Annie. She is fighting and punching the air like a crazy person, chasing a swan. A little girl starts crying. Annie walks back through the house, through the crowd holding her chocolate covered hands in the air.  I actually thought I wanted to be like you...and you and YOU, to be a part of this world. That's not who I am. I make bad choices. I'm broke, I lost my stupid job, I'm thirty two years old and I still answer booty calls. I don't like Mike Donahue cause he  on our date. I have a single black hair that grows out of my chin and I can't wear white t-shirts cause something about my sweat turns the pits yellow! AND you know when we were in Vegas? When you were all staying at your luxury hotel? I was staying at Hotel RICK where got BODY LICE! So Helen, you can have the coveted Maid of Honor title. You can have it all wrapped up in a big pink obnoxious musical box! Because all its brought me is a big pain in my ass. Congratulations! Annie leaves and Lillian runs after her.  Well let me fill you in. Ever since you got engaged, my life has turned to shit.  I'm selfish? You're the one that's been so wrapped up in all this. Designer dressed, extravagant hotels, this shower, this is not you!  Well at least my friendship's not for sale. This hangs in the air. Annie storms off. Lillian storms back inside.     Thank you! Her car won't start. Trying to keep it together, she grabs her running shoes from the back seat and storms down the highway, trying not to cry. A cop car pulls next to her. I's Rhodes.  Yes. Taillights. I know!  I KNOW! Yes, you're friend! But I didn't ok?! I didn't get them fixed! I don't--  HE hit ME!     Why are you yelling at me?!  I'm! Sorry! He calms down.  Well save yourself the trouble, and don't.  Well, I have said ânoâ anyway.  Oh, hi.  Yeah, I know. I'm irresponsible.  A week?  Yes I did. Everything's just... She starts crying. Steve hands her a tissue from the middle console.  I'm sorry, I just--this has been a really shitty day.  Yes I do! Right? Thank you. 116.  This is not about attitude. It's just the facts! My life hasn't turned it out the way I expected. I don't have any of those things that gives a person points in the world.     No. The lady sits next to Annie and smiles at her.  Oh, hey Ted. You're in town.  Really? Ok, sure. Ted smiles at her. Annie stops herself.  Wait no. No. No. I don't think I do. Because answering your booty calls and having you kick me out after a night of no-strings-attached sex doesn't feel good. NO girls feel good after that and if they say they do they're LYING. But it's not your fault. Its me. It's me. Have a great life. And you can keep the plant. Annie grabs her stuff and leaves.     Annie sadly hangs up.  No, I think we've covered everything. I'm really excited and thank you. Annie gathers her things.  I'll see you next Monday. What time do I start?  I won't be late.  (smiling] Yeah. Ok.  Hi, I'm here to inquire about financial aid. Her cell phone rings.  I'm sorry? Annie's trying to find her phone.  Thanks. It's too late, she looks at her phone. It was Lillian. No message. She doesn't call her back.  Discount?  Are you serious?  You're kidding! If you see him, would you thank him for me and tell him that I'm crazy and I'm sorry. He'll know what you mean.     Hello?  Oh. Hi--  What do you mean she's missing?  Um, gosh I..I don't know. Um, I'll come to you guys. I'll be there in an hour and 45 minutes. I wanna help. Annie hangs up, grabs her keys. She stops, comes back and grabs a small paper bag, and runs out the door.  Oh my God! I think I know where she is.  We're almost there.  Guys it's just a flat. I've gotten tons of them. Annie goes to get out of the car.  Guys! We're fine. Helen, put the hazards on. Helen puts them on. 124.  Helen, do you have a jack?  Dana calm down.  Everyone's gotta get out, if you want me to fix this. They complain that its dangerous, i's cold, but they do. Annie puts the jack under car.  Hold the flashlight. Leslie and Megan watch as Annie pumps the jack. She really does know what she's doing! The car is raising. 125.  Megan hand me the wrench. Megan hands it to her. Annie starts to unscrew the lug nuts handing them to Megan, with Leslie by her side. Dana and Becca stand with Helen.  I'm removing the lug nuts so we can take the tire off.  Just changing the tire.  Nope I think we got it. But thank you. He doesn't leave, the girls worriedly look at each other.  Almost there. The guy has lifted up his hood and Mega's looking. He puts his hands on her ass. 129.  OK, everybody in the car! Get in! Megan, Helen let's go! All the girls scramble in the car, Helen starts it. Annie is finishing.  Back away! Or I will shove this Jack so far down your throat you will shit out...your fucking..face!  Get out! 130.  Helen hit him over the head with a tree. They all continue talking, Helen and Annie smile.  There it is, turn left up here. Go down the little hill. Ok, that's the driveway. It's dark and very rustic. It's LILLIAN'S LAKE HOUSE FROM THE FLASHBACK. Where Lillian and Dougie met.  The house is right up here. They pull up to a small cottage and get out of the car.  I thought she'd be here. I really thought she'd be here. I'm sorry.  No, it's not. I don't know what happened. I messed everything up. Lillia's not even talking to me. I think I'm so afraid to see what's really happening. Lillian's moving on to this great life and I feel left behind. And know matter how hard I try, I don't fit in to her life now. Everyone is silent.  Lillian wouldn't do that. If she asked you to be in her wedding it's because you are her friend. Trust me. Dana is crying and takes a picture. The're both startled by the flash.  I'm sorry that when I left the shower I told your neighbors you were shooting a porn. 132.  Oh, well, sorry.  I must say you do put on some pretty spectacular events.  It is getting pretty late.  She'll come home when she's ready.     You okay?  It's okay. I really am sorry.  Well its easy to get caught up. 133.  I'm sorry. But it's all good now. We all talked and everythings cool.  Yup, Helen and I are best friends now. We're going shopping for cream sweaters tomorrow.  I know.  It's not too late to have those things.  It's fine. I just feel really lost right  Oh God dont say that. 134.  You want to come in? Steve's home. This could be your last chance as a single woman.  Thanks for coming with me. Megan appears on her other side.  A week. I'm scared. I'm gonna be the oldest one there.  Really?  Oh, I want to catch this shuttle back to the hotel.  I will see YOU in a couple weeks Mrs. Price! 136. Lillian waves goodbye and turns to go back inside. Annie runs towards the shuttle. She's too late. The shuttle drives away without her. She JUST missed it.  Wait! Wait! Stop! Great. Of course. The shuttle is gone, but there's something that was on the other side of it.  How did you know I was here?  Wow. They're looking at each other, not knowing what to do.  So, did you get the moonpies?  Did you like' em?  Ooo, I didn't think about that. 137.     How did you know I was here?  So, did you get the moonpies?  Did you like' em?  Ooo, I didn't think about that.
dialogues.Don: Annie! Thank God. OK people! Gather around me please, in a tight semicircle. Annie and six other employees gather around DONNA.  Something terrible has happened. Donald will not be coming in to work today. He stepped on a wasp and there is some uncomfortable swelling. Employees mumble.  Annie? Where's your tie? Everyone looks at Annie. She holds it up and starts to put it on. 8.  Now, I have an eye doctor's appointment that I can't change or they'll will charge me. So someone will have to cover for Donald in engagement rings. Now I-- Annie and SANDY, a male co-worker, shoot their hands the air eagerly.  Sandy? Today's your day.  Annie, that means you'll be alone in keepsakes. You think you can handle it?  Alright everybody, let's get to work! Saneel?!...OPEN SESAME! SANEEL, the security guard, rolls his eyes and unlocks the doors. Everyone goes to work. Donna gathers her things and starts walking towards the exit with Annie tailing behind her.  Annie, what is the calibration of a 2 carat diamond in a standard English setting?  I just made all of that up. None of that was real. I just put words together. You're not ready for the big leagues. Understand?  Sweetheart...did I ever tell you the story of the little paralyzed Chinese girl who wanted to be dancer?  She was paralyzed Annie, had no feeling in her legs, and then one day after years of believing in herself, she stood up out of that chair and tap-danced for the king. On his birthday! My point is, Sandy makes a real effort around here. He connects with the customer. And when he wants to make a sale, he goes for it.  Good. Showing up on time is a wonderful place to start. Donna talks to herself and gathers her things.  Uhh! A wasp! Who walks around even their own backyard without at least a thin sandal. It's reckless! Donna exits. A customer passes Anni's section.          And then they put a solution in my eyes to dilate them, which caused temporary blindness and with the loss of my sight, my hearing became bionic. Do you need some help dear? Annie struggles to open a bag of chips but her new ULTRA LONG, french-manicured nail-tips are making it very hard.  Annie and Donna are doing inventory. Annie gets text.  Don't be nervous. It's not all on your shoulders. Doesnt she have other bridesmaids?  I wish I could help. Weddings are a lot different now then they were in my day. They look at Donna's wedding picture on her desk.  I still have it. I was hoping my daughter Elizabeth would wear it but when she and Alice had their âceremonyâ they both wanted to wear suits.  Ok, we need two Shannisburg tennis bracelets. Annie struggles to write with her nails.  They're very long.     You know, I knew a girl once. Karen Stippleton. She was really something. The life of the party, a concert pianist, she had naturally curly hair, and skin black as night. But one evening at a dinner party I walked in on her in the bathroom putting a vile of cocaine up her buttocks and last I heard, she was playing the saxophone outside of a drug store. And I'm gonna say something to you I should have told her. Don't waste your life. Find out what your gifts are and use them. Donna hugs Annie, then leaves her in the break room.  Hello, I'm Susan Sarandon, the movie star. I just wanted to say congratulations to Lillian and Dougie. Even though I don't believe in marriage, I do âbelieve in the church of basebalâ. Just kidding. That's a line from my movie Bull Durham. I- Annie hangs up quickly.
dialogues.Annie's: Annie in her car, engine running.                   The cat jumps on the bed and meows. Annie opens her eyes to see Dave sleeping. She notices his college tattoo on his arm .                             Annie sadly hangs up.
dialogues.Mom: Groomsman DEAN finishes a speech. They are now in the dining room.  Annie now stands next to the chocolate fountain. She looks around, drops her glass in it and unplugs it with her foot. It stops flowing. She looks around and throws some leaves in it and walks away.
dialogues.Lillian: It's summer?! What the hell does that mean? He can't date anyone in the summer?  No he's stupid Ann, not you.  Ew. Did you have sex with him?  What?!  Well, at least he was honest with you so you don't waste your time with him.  Can you see that I'm on the phone? I'm talking to Annie.  Are you eating my Luna Bar? Those are for women you know?  It's not gonna do anything to you.  Ew, go take a shower. Dougie leaves.  I swear I cannot handle him right now. He has been driving me crazy. Sometimes it feels like I'm kissing my brother. I don't know what do. Annie pulls into an alleyway behind HARRINGTO'S JEWELRY STORE and starts changing into her work uniform in the car. A white blouse and navy skirt.  There's nothing wrong with you. But I think maybe, and don't get mad at me, I've said this to you before, you need to stop trying so hard.  OK, so you had a first date last night. Did you bring him a present? Annie is silent.  Ann, what did I tell you?  What?!  Ok, I don't know if it's because I'm tired or what, but I wanna kill him.  Oh my God. We need to hang out. 'm coming to Milwaukee this weekend.  We'll go to Joni's and pig out and I'll bring some shitty magazines, and I'm gonna spend the night.  I'll call you tomorrow. Bye. They hang up. Dougie is in the doorway wearing her nightie stretched over his body.  You're an idiot. We see she gets a kick out of him.  Ann.  Your boyfriend just walked in. REVEAL: An orange-skinned BODY BUILDER with HUGE arms and legs in a tiny muscle tank and shorts.  Here Annie, let me turn the page for you.  I just want to help you turn the page of your magazine for you...  I'm engaged.  He proposed at dinner last night. I wanted to tell you in person and show you this rock!  I know Dougie and I have been fighting a lot, but I've been so stressed out with  Oh you want to get into who's done what down at the lake?  Well then, who better to be my Maid of Honor?  Annie, you're my best friend. Honestly I didn't even have to think about it. 13.  It's no big deal, and I don't want to make it one. It's not gonna be a big crazy thing. I wanna keep it simple. What dessert are you gonna get?  Ok, but I still don't want this to be a huge production. I just want to have all my friends meet each other, have fun, dance, drink, whatever.  Oh God, not yet. I don't want a super long engagement, but there's a lot to do.  Can you hold that thought. I's my fiancee calling. Lillian gets up laughing. Annie laughs along with her.     I do. Do you Annie Lucille Walker, take your husband, forever? Reveal Annie standing next to a poster of John Baker from Chips.  And now we will leave on our honeymoon to...    The madness has begun. Dougie's parents are having an engagement party for us next Friday.  Ann!  Hey!  Smoking a cigar with my dad. Le's go get a drink. They weave towards the bar.  Hold on Dougie, we're getting drinks! They get to the bar and grab glasses of wine.  Yeah. So does Dougie. This is the tennis club I've been playing at.  Tennis courts are tennis courts if you ask me. But I have met a lot of really cool people here. I can't wait for you to meet the girls.  Oh shoot, Matt's not coming. I guess he got back together with his ex or something. Anyway, Dougie just told me. Sorry.  Dougie, be careful. God, you reek! He puts her down.  Ugh. Wash your face. She gives in and kisses him. Then says to Annie..  Come on. Let's go say hi to the rest of the bridal party. They approach LESLIE, Lillian's cousin, late 30's, standing with her husband PAUL.  Annie this is Dana, we met here in my tennis class. Dana, Annie.  Dougie's partner.  Ann, there you are!  I'm saving you. Now I really want to introduce you to Helen. looking around) There she is. In slow motion, a tall and gorgeous HELEN turns to us. She wears a tight, cream-colored, floor-length evening gown. Annie straightens her plastic beads.  Helen, this is Annie.  Perry owns Atmospheria candles.  You are?  No, you sang. They both laugh.  Ann, stop. 35.  Besides the impromptu concert from Bette Midler, it was perfect. They laugh and hug.  I gotta go say bye to some people I do't know. Drive safe. Lillian goes back inside. Helen appears out of thin air.  Annie, we can go somewhere else.  (sotto} Wow, thanks Helen. INT. âOCCASIONZ' BRIDAL SHOP. DAYTIME. Whitney and Helen are leading the girls down the hall. Lillian and Annie tail the group.  Ann, don't worry about it. We got in. Annie sees racks of wedding dresses.  Oh my God. Annie, I didn't tell you? Guess who Helen is friends with? Lady Lavonia Jean St. Petsois JuJu. 42.  That famous wedding dress designer tha's in all those wedding magazines? As a favor to Helen she's going to design my dress for almost nothing. Normally they're like twenty grand. She's French.     Surprise, surprise. It's my Mom. Mom? Can you hold on a second? She covers the phone and talks to the girls.  Start looking at dresses. I'll be right back. I think maybe you guys should decide anyway and pick out something you like since you're the ones wearing it. Cool?  Have fun! What's up Mom? Ugh! They're booked? Lillian leaves talking to her Mom.  Hey! I'm hearing lots of excitement in here. She touches Helen's dress.  Oooo, I like this one. What about you guys?  Cool. Let's eat! Helen dumps the dress in Annie's arms and follows Lillian.  Ooh, good idea. They exit.  This place is kind of amazing. I did't even know it existed.  I'm sorry, I was just talking about you cause I was worried about you and-- 48.  Mike from the fourth of July last year? Ooh, I've seen him Ann. He's hot.  Yeah Annie, you never know. 50.  I don't know. Shoot, I can't talk now. I'm with Helen and we have a conference call with Lady Lavonia Jean St. Petsois JuJu about my dress. Ugh. I'm so sorry. She's calling! I gotta go. Have fun! Lillian hangs up. Steve walks in. 53.  Holy Shit Annie! We're goin' to Vegas!  Annie, come here. Why didn't you tell me you weren't sitting with us?  I'm so excited!  Oh my God. You guys, is this for us?!  This hotel is amazing! You guys!  Oh! Okay! Then party in room 812 in one hour!   Annie! I wanna see a drink in your hand in one minute! Lillian pulls Annie into the room. Helen is getting off of the phone.  Thank you everybody!!  Ok, Leslie spilled the beans. Le's get our asses over to Sacrifice. What are we waiting for? Wooooooo! Lillian looks at Helen's legs.  Whoa whoa. Helen, turn around. Are those those Ransom Jeans? 77.  Oh my God, Annie our song! Wher's Annie?  Where's Annie?!  Why!?  Is she okay?! Should I call her!?  Annie!  Are you ok?  What do you mean here, where?  You're where?  Listen I can't hear you! We had to leave the Jungle Lounge, Becca--  Meet us at the--  Whoa. What are you, going to a rodeo?  Yeah, why are you wearing all that makeup?  What?!  I was trying to find YOU. I tried to call you all night!  What is going on? You told Helen you were sick.  Why didn't you say something?--  Annie take it easy.  Guys stop! Please! Annie, I'm so sorry about last night. I feel horrible. I want to hear everything that happened. Tonight, you're not leaving my side. We're hittin' the strip club all of us and we're going to put this shit behind us. Okay?! The girls agree. Dana rubs her arm.  Oooh, Ann! A siren goes off.  Get her! Get her!!  Only you Annie. Hands down, best moment of the weekend. Annie finally feels a part of the group.  Oh look, there's your boyfriend.  Oh my God. You know who that actually looks like? Remember when we went to Miami and we had to rent towels--  And that lady came up to us wearing that mesh top!  Annie sits on the doorstep. Lillian runs up with a bunch of stuff in her arms and opens the door. They enter the apartment.  I'm so sorry. I was at our travel agen's trying to figure out how to get my da's family out here, they all have to fly at different times, uggh. What's that on your arms? She sees some of Annie's lice medicine motion.  Oh shit, I'm sorry, I have to check one thing really quick. When is my hair consultation? Lillian frantically looks through her calender.  Oh no.  I knew it. I'm going to have my period on my wedding day...and my honeymoon!  It's our wedding night though!  I can't believe this. This sucks. Oh, Annie I wanted to ask you. Do you think for the cocktail party before the reception we should have a string trio or a horn trio?  What?  I know but now that I'm planning everything it's just...I wanna do it right. It's once in a life time. It's my wedding. Lillian's phone rings.  Ugh! It's Dougie's Mom. She's mad at me because I won't let her invite everyone from her work. Oh! That reminds me. If you're not going to bring anybody, will you let me know? I gotta free up some spots. (into phone] Hello? Lillian walks away with the phone. Annie is speechless.  Annieee!!! Lillian runs to her.  Can you believe this?  Coming Mom! I gotta go say hi to my aunts. She leaves and Helen appears out of nowhere again.  Oh! My towels! Thank you Dana.  Annie.  Oh, our mugs! Thank you Annie.  Wait, what's this? Lillian pulls out an envelope.  Oh my God. Helen. Lillian holds up the tickets.  Two first class tickets to Sea World. How did you--  Annie! What is going on with you?  Annie stop! I don't know what's going on.  I'm sorry the the happiest time in my life has brought you so much misery. Do you know how selfish that sounds?  This is my wedding and you've made it all about you. 112.  Anyone else?! Anyone else have something they wanna say to me?! Dana can't contain herself.     Yeah. Didn't mean to make anyone worry.  I'm sorry too. I didnt want things to turn out like this. I got so caught up in the frenzy of everything, wanting this one day to be perfect.  And it doesnt help that all my friends hate eachother.  She's really not so bad.  I just wish the wedding hadnt become about everything and everyone else but me and Dougie. And now, it's become this thing I never wanted. I did want simple. I wanted colored lanterns, twinkly lights and food everywhere. I wanted a DJ to play all those stupid wedding songs.  I'm sorry I didn't know all the stuff you were going through too. Annie is clearly sad.  Nothing's going to change.  I mean between you and me.  Ooooo...  So when does school start?  So what? Now you can have an affair with your teacher and it won't be gross. They walk down the steps.  Thanks for everything today. Yo've been the best Maid of Honor ever.  MMM. No. That's not true at all. You were pretty terrible. Today you were good. Annie sees the hotel shuttle.  You're always gonna be my best friend. They hug goodbye. She runs down the stairs.
dialogues.Becca: Lil! Is this Annie?! Annie and Lillian walk over.  Hi Annie! I'm Becca. I've heard so much about you. This is my husband Kevin. 29.  So, are you so excited?! All of this reminds me so much of my wedding.  Two months now! It was the best day of my life. I'm married now! It's like...I'm just better now! It might sound weird but... I feel legit. Just like, feminine. Look at my nails! Two beautifully french manicured hands with a HUGE 3 carat diamond ring.  Ooooops, where are my manners. Hi! I'm Becca Whitman. REVEAL a very smart looking, older African-American MAN standing next to Annie. He is wearing an ascot and smoking a pipe.  You didn't make a reservation?  This really is the best place though, that's the thing.  Why not?! Annie and Helen come out to see all the bridesmaids arguing.  That's not too bad/that sounds about right.  The southwestern cobb is really good. I come here and eat sometimes.  Oh, I hate to hear stuff like that! What happened?  Wait. I have the perfect guy for you Annie. Mike Donahue. He went to school with Kevin.  And Kevin said he just sold his company for an embarrassing amount of money. But he's totally down to earth. You guys have to meet. I'm texting Kevin right now.  Hi, Annie. It's Becca. Becca, in her shabby-chic home office paints a front porch sign that says âThe Whitman'sâ 66.  I was just looking at your e-mail, yo're so cute. Sea World. What about Turkey? That's where we went for for MY bachelorette.  It's super old though! They have awesome restaurants. It's very exotic. Have you ever seen Aladdin? It totally looks like that.  Hi. You know, if you wanna go some place closer than Turkey. Helen JUST e-mailed me about going to Vegas.  I never get sick of it. I love blackjack. I have a system. Annie's other line.  When?  Vegas has these party busses that have flat screens in them and dance floors--  So I think Vegas is a good idea.  Oooh, Annie's here! 74.  Isn't this amazing? Lillian runs over and hugs Annie, wearing a condom veil and drinking out of a penis straw.  Annie, I didn't get a chance to ask you, how was your date with Mike? Give me all the details.  Do you think you'll go out with him again? He told Kevin he thought you were really great and hot. 75.  Yeah/Just split it/Who cares?  It'll all even out by the end of the night.  I don't know! Why?  Becca it's over.  She lives here! She lives in Vegas.  That was disgusting! I'm so glad I'm married.  Annie! They walk to her.  That's a big cookie huh.  Kevin smokes pot! Leslie stands up.  I don't think she'd leave the country. Maybe she went to the reservoir.  I'm think I'm getting carsick.  Why do you always have to be so condescending? 123.  What was that?  No!/ Annie don't get out!/ It's pitch dark out.  I'm calling Kevin!  Me neither!  I know. I can't believe she's doing it. Dana and Becca move over to Annie. Helen waits alone.  How does that little thing lift the whole car?  What's happening? What's happening?  Be quiet! The guy is moving closer to Megan.  She's not here. Annie is sitting on the front step, defeated. 131.

description: Annie (Kristen Wiig), is a maid of honor whose life unravels as she leads her best friend Lillian (Maya Rudolph) and a group of colorful bridesmaids (Rose Byrne, Melissa McCarthy, Wendi McLendon-Covey, and Ellie Kemper) on a wild ride down the path to matrimony. Annie's life is a mess, but when she finds out her lifetime best friend is engaged, she simply must serve as Lillian's maid of honor. Though lovelorn and broke, Annie bluffs her way through the expensive and bizarre rituals. With one chance to get it perfect, she'll show Lillian and her bridesmaids just how far a true friend will go for a friend.—Anonymous
name: Bridesmaids
